Label: cluster
Comment: Cofactor for mitochondrial lipoyl synthase through LIAS [https://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/O43766]

Label: GCSH
Comment: The H-protein is responsible for interacting with the three other proteins and acts as a shuttle for some of the intermediate products in glycine decarboxylation. [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glycine_cleavage_system]</br>After removing CO2 from glycine, the remaining amino-methyl group ir transferred to lipoate on the H-protein

Label: DLD
Comment: aka GCSL</br>reduced lipoate is re-oxidized by the L-protein

Label: CH2=folate
Comment: aka methylene-tetrahydrofolate, 5,10-Methylenetetrahydrofolate (annotated with naturally occuring diastereoisomer ID, named [6R]-5,10-methylene-THF.).
